Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two added white bands at lower edge; exterior: sphinx (face and neck remaining) to right; dot rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 257, no. 467, pl. 63)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0531) (phase 2)
